Class JCoincheClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • JCoincheClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class JCoincheClientHandler
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
    This class is the main client controller netty one. It contains callback that is called when an event is throwed by the netty main EventLoop.
    See Also:
    JCoincheClient, ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
